sourcesContent:
<template>
  <baidu-map class="map" ak="mxpL0DFKOun0L9A09AjTERKjcNkDuAEO" v="3.0" type="API" :center="{lng: 116.404, lat: 39.915}" :zoom="15">
  </baidu-map>
</template>

<script>
import { BaiduMap } from "vue-baidu-map-3x";
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      steps: [],
    };
  },
  mounted() {
    var map = new BMapGL.Map("allmap");
    map.centerAndZoom(new BMapGL.Point(116.404, 39.915), 11);
    map.enableScrollWheelZoom(true);
  },
  methods: {
    initMap() {
      //初始化地图
      const map = new TMap.Map("mapContainer", {
        center: new TMap.LatLng(31.242497, 121.488892),
        zoom: 14,
      });
      let lat = 31.242497;
      let lng = 121.488892;

      //绑定点击事件，获取纬度和经度
      map.on("click", (evt) => {
        //获取纬度
        lat = evt.latLng.getLat().toFixed(6);
        //获取经度
        lng = evt.latLng.getLng().toFixed(6);
      });

      const startPosition = new TMap.LatLng(lat, lng); // 路线规划起点
      const endPosition = new TMap.LatLng(31.296605, 121.506377); // 路线规划终点
      const marker = new TMap.MultiMarker({
        id: "marker-layer",
        map: map,
        styles: {
          start: new TMap.MarkerStyle({
            width: 25,
            height: 35,
            anchor: { x: 16, y: 32 },
            src: "https://mapapi.qq.com/web/lbs/javascriptGL/demo/img/start.png",
          }),
          end: new TMap.MarkerStyle({
            width: 25,
            height: 35,
            anchor: { x: 16, y: 32 },
            src: "https://mapapi.qq.com/web/lbs/javascriptGL/demo/img/end.png",
          }),
        },
        geometries: [
          {
            id: "start",
            styleId: "start",
            position: startPosition,
          },
          {
            id: "end",
            styleId: "end",
            position: endPosition,
          },
        ],
      });

      const driving = new TMap.service.Driving({
        mp: false,
        policy: "PICKUP,NAV_POINT_FIRST",
      });
      driving.search({ from: startPosition, to: endPosition }).then((result) => {
        this.steps = result.result.routes[0].steps;
        this.displayPolyline(result.result.routes[0].polyline);
      });
    },
    displayPolyline(pl) {
      const polylineLayer = new TMap.MultiPolyline({
        id: "polyline-layer",
        map: map,
        styles: {
          style_blue: new TMap.PolylineStyle({
            color: "#3777FF",
            width: 8,
            borderWidth: 5,
            borderColor: "#FFF",
            lineCap: "round",
          }),
        },
        geometries: [
          {
            id: "pl_1",
            styleId: "style_blue",
            paths: pl,
          },
        ],
      });
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style>
html,
body {
  height: 100%;
  margin: 0px;
  padding: 0px;
}

#mapContainer {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
}

#panel {
  position: absolute;
  background: #fff;
  width: 350px;
  padding: 20px;
  z-index: 9999;
  top: 30px;
  left: 30px;
}
</style>
